title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 53.3 - Hunting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 53.3 - Hunting

State Regulations
(a) It is unlawful
for any person to hunt on the property except from October 15th through

December 20th and from the opening day of spring turkey season through May
31st. (b) It is unlawful for any
person to hunt deer and small game except with longbow from October 15th
through the day before the opening of the Southern Zone regular big game
season. (c) It is unlawful for any
person to hunt deer and small game except with legal firearms and longbow from
the opening day of the Southern Zone regular big game season through December
20th. (d) It is unlawful for any
person to hunt on the property without first obtaining a special permit from

Scenic Hudson Land Trust, Inc. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
53.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
